endpoint.name: data/inputs/google_spreadsheet
endpoint.header: Import Google spreadsheets into Splunk and use them as lookups

element.name: interval
element.label: Interval
element.key: The interval defining how often to perform the import; can include time units (e.g. 15m for 15 minutes, 8h for 8 hours)

element.name: operation
element.label: Operation
element.key: Operation to perform (export to Google or import into Splunk)

element.name: lookup_name
element.label: Lookup
element.key: The lookup to import the data into

element.name: only_if_changed
element.label: Import only if the file changed
element.key: The interval defining how often to perform the import; can include time units (e.g. 15m for 15 minutes, 8h for 8 hours)

element.name: spreadsheet
element.label: Spreadsheet Title
element.key: The title of the Google spreadsheet

element.name: worksheet
element.label: Worksheet Name
element.key: The name of the worksheet (e.g. "Sheet1") in the Google Spreadsheet

element.name: google_login
element.label: Login Name
element.key: The login to use when authenticating to Google

element.name: google_password
element.label: Password
element.key: The password to use for authenticating to Google
